segments.text: OK . I just saw a Versace for thirty dollars . This stuff can't be real !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most of it is . You should sign up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure I'd want to give these people my credit card number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Didn't you read about Paypal and Bidpai ? They are very safe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , but it's so complicated . They asked for my credit card authorization number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the last three or four numbers on the back of your credit card where your signature is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have trouble understanding all these forms ... but I'm sure I'll get it .
segments.speaker: S1
